Interface CriteriaSerializer<T>

All Superinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseSerializer, BeanSerializer, CollectionSerializer, EnumSerializer, MapSerializer, PrimitiveSerializer, StaticBeanSerializer, StaticCollectionSerializer, StaticMapSerializer
public interface CriteriaSerializer<T>
extends Serializer<T>

Decides wether or not a seriazer can be applied on an object.
